item.title: [vow] Rot-Tide Gargantua
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Kraken

Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)

When Rot-Tide Gargantua exploits a creature, each opponent sacrifices a creature.

item.title: [vow] Sigarda's Summons
item.description:
Enchantment

Creatures you control with +1/+1 counters on them have base power and toughness 4/4, have flying, and are Angels in addition to their other types.

item.description:
Creature — Vampire

When Gluttonous Guest enters the battlefield, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

Whenever you sacrifice a Blood token, you gain 1 life.

item.title: [vow] Anje, Maid of Dishonor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire

Whenever Anje, Maid of Dishonor and/or one or more other Vampires enter the battlefield under your control, create a Blood token. (It's an artifact with "{1}, {T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

{2}, Sacrifice another creature or a Blood token: Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.

item.title: [vow] Wedding Invitation
item.description:
Artifact

When Wedding Invitation enters the battlefield, draw a card.

{T}, Sacrifice Wedding Invitation: Target creature can't be blocked this turn. If it's a Vampire, it also gains lifelink until end of turn.

item.title: [voc] Strefan, Maurer Progenitor
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Vampire Noble

Flying

We the beginning of your end step, create a Blood token for each player who lost life this turn.

Whenever Strefan, Maurer Progenitor attacks, you may sacrifice two Blood tokens. If you do, you may put a Vampire card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking. It gains indestructible until end of turn.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1189365133

item.title: [voc] Millicent, Restless Revenant
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit Soldier

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each Spirit you control.

Flying

Whenever Millicent, Restless Revenant or another nontoken Spirit you control dies or deals damage to a player, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1189365133

item.title: [vow] Savior of Ollenblock
item.description:
Creature — Human Soldier

Training (Whenever this creature attacks with another creature with greater power, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)

Whenever Savior of Ollenblock trains, exile up to one other target creature from the battlefield or creature card from a graveyard.

When Savior of Ollenblock leaves the battlefield, return the exiled cards onto the battlefield under their owners's control.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1189365133

item.title: [vow] Grolnok, the Omnivore
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Frog

Whenever a Frog you control attacks, mill 3 cards.

Whenever a permanent card is put into your graveyard from your library, exile it with a croak counter on it.

You may play lands and cast spells from among cards you own in exile with croak counters on them.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1189365133

item.title: [vow] Massive Might
item.description:
Instant

Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn.

https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/innistrad-crimson-vow-mechanics-2021-10-28

item.title: [vow] Dominating Vampire
item.description:
Creature — Vampire

When Dominating Vampire enters the battlefield, gain control of target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of Vampires you control until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn.

https://www.twitch.tv/videos/1189365133

item.title: [vow] Fell Stinger
item.description:
Creature — Zombie Scorpion

Deathtouch

Exploit (When this creature enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice a creature.)

When Fell Stinger exploits a creature, target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

item.title: [vow] Demonic Bargain
item.description:
Sorcery

Exile the top thirteen cards of your library, then search your library for a card. Put that card into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [vow] Geistlight Snare
item.description:
Instant

This spell costs {1} less to cast if you control a Spirit. It also costs {1} less to cast if you control an enchantment.

Counter target spell if its controller pays {3}.
